mapper.select:
select apply_brand_id, apply_brand_name, apply_brand_pic, apply_brand_del_flag, apply_brand_create_time, apply_modify_time, apply_third_id, apply_url,apply_status,apply_certificate,apply_refusal_reason,store_name from np_apply_brand LEFT JOIN np_third_store_info on apply_third_id = store_id where apply_brand_del_flag != '1'
and apply_brand_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{applyBrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and apply_status = '0' order by apply_brand_create_time desc limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(1) from np_apply_brand LEFT JOIN np_third_store_info on apply_third_id = store_id where apply_brand_del_flag != '1'
and apply_brand_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{applyBrandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and apply_status = '0'
